page.title: 08RECREATION:MK WESTON & B'HAM
page.content: Organised provision consists of a village hall & public house in each village, also the villae hall & an out door swimming pool in Hopton Primary school. The halls are used for regular events & for occasions such as Christ- mads Fairs & Horticultural Shows. The Mill Inn, Market Weston, a Free House, serves full meals at licensed opening times;The Royal George,Barningham, Greene King, serves bar snacks & boasts a darts team. Hopton school pool may be used in the summer by other children & adults for 2 hours after school & on weekend afternoons during term-time and the school holidays.Other leisure activities include Annual Summer Fetes, informal sporting fixtures,organised community events such as walks,talks & jumble sales. There are regular meet- ings of WI,Brownies,clubs for the retired etc.
